notFound.NextSteps: Sebelisa lethathamo la mantlha ho fumana seo u se batlang.

greeting.Welcome: Rea u amohela ho {{1}}. Mona u tla fumana lintho tse rometsoeng litho tsa sechaba sa rona. Ka kopo, kenya aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila kapa nomoro ea mohala hore o tle o fumane litsebiso ha liphatlalatso li kenngoa.

promote.Title: Bapatsa ketsahalo ena
promote.Prompt: Khetha moo o batlang ho bapatsa ketsahalo ena:

interests.Title: Lithahasello
interests.prompt: Khetha mefuta ea lintho tseo u batlang ho tseba ka tsona.
interests.explanation: Ha u khetha lintho tse ngata tseo u li ratang, ho na le menyetla e mengata ea ho hokahana le batho ba nang le maikutlo a tšoanang.
interests.Profile: Lithahasello tse peli lia totobatsoa. Haeba u na le thahasello e le 'ngoe kapa tse ngata tse ka tlase, u ka {{clickOrTap}} ho li kenya.

credits.Title: Likoloto
credits.EarnCredits: Fumana {{1}} likalimo bakeng sa motho e mong le e mong e mocha eo u mo memang ea kenela app

name.Placeholder: Kenya lebitso la hau ka botlalo
name.AsOwner: O memiloe joalo ka mong'a ntlo.
name.TooShort: Lebitso la hao le felletseng le ka se be lekgutshwane hakaalo
name.SetAsYourFullName: Beha {{1}} hore e be lebitso la hao ka botlalo?

interests.Instructions:
Karolong e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe ea {{1}} e latelang,
{{2}} mesebetsi yohle eo o e ratang.
Ena ke tsela eo u hokahanang le batho ba bang sechabeng.

profile.Profile: Boemo ba hau bo thusa batho ho tseba haholoanyane ka uena.
profile.Birthday: Ka kopo, kenya letsatsi la hau la tsoalo:
profile.Placeholder: U mang, 'me u etsa'ng? Bolella batho ntho e khahlisang kapa e ikhethang ka uena.
profile.Required: Ho tsoela pele, ngola bonyane mela e 'maloa ka uena.

location.NoOneElse: Ha ho motho e mong ya tla e bona.

profile.Title: Profile
profile.blockUserAlert: Ha o sa tla bona melaetsa e meng e tsoang ho mosebelisi enoa ho fihlela o e lokolla.
profile.aboutPlaceholder: U mang, 'me u etsa'ng? Bolella batho ntho e khahlisang kapa e ikhethang ka uena.
profile.explanation:
Boemo ba hau bo u thusa ho u bapisa hantle le batho ba bang bakeng sa mesebetsi ea sehlopha.
Ka kopo, kenya letsatsi la hau la tsoalo

composer.creditsChargeRequest: A na u lumela ho sebelisa {{price}} likoloto?

notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Rea u amohela! Ka kopo, netefatsa aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Rea u amohela! Netefatsa aterese ea hau ea lengolo-tsoibila.
notifications.ForgetPass: Lumela, na u lebetse poleloana ea hau ea lekunutu?
notifications.ManageEmailSubscriptions: laola lipehelo tsa hau tsa lengolo-tsoibila

name.Welcome: Rea u amohela ho {{CommunityName}}. Sesebelisoa sena se tla u thusa ho hokahana le metsoalle, ho fumana batho ba bacha ba nang le lithahasello tse tšoanang, le tse ling tse ngata. A re qaleng!

icon.Commentary: Seta senepe sa hau. Ke kamoo batho ba tla u bona setšeng.

interests.Commentary: Ha u khetha lintho tse ngata, u ka kopana le batho ba bangata.

subscriptions.confirm: Litsebiso li u fa monyetla oa ho tseba ka lintho tseo u li ratang, joalo ka ha motsoalle a kenela app, kapa melaetsa ea hau.

speak.invite: {{Q.words.TapOrClick}} mona ho bona hore na o ka arolelana sena le batho ba bang jwang.

payment.onContribute: Kea leboha! Tefo ea hau e fetile. A na u ka thabela ho memela metsoalle ea hau ho tla ho uena?

featureboard.Text_1: Lentswe la hao le utlwahale! A na u lumela hore re lokela ho hlahisa tšobotsi kapa bothata? Tobetsa konopo ho e Tšehetsa.
featureboard.Text_2: U batla ho hlahisa karolo e ncha? E hlalose ka tlase.
featureboard.Text_3: Beke e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe re qala ho hlahisa karolo e ka holimo e kopiloeng ke sechaba. Chelete eohle e fanoeng e ea molemong oo, e re fa monyetla oa ho ntlafatsa app.
featureboard.Text_4: Chelete eohle e fanoeng e sebelisetsoa ho lefella litšenyehelo tsa rona tsa ntlafatso.
featureboard.Text_5: A na u na le mohopolo mabapi le karolo kapa phoso eo u batlang hore re e etse empa ha u so bone ba bang ba e kenya? E hlalose ka tlase:

Options.text: Lintlha tsa $200 tsa lehae tsa ngoliso ea mantlha
$130 Batla le ho arolelana likete tsa {{1}} meme

featureboard.FeatureDescription: Hlalosa hore na motho e mong a ka hlahisa bothata boo u bo bonang joang, kapa a hlalose ka botlalo tšobotsi eo u batlang ho e theha

contribute.ContributeExplanation: Thusa ho thusa ho ntšetsa pele ntlafatso ea sesebelisoa sa {{communityName}}. Lithuso tsohle tsa hau li thusa ho lokisa liphoso le ho nts'etsapele likarolo tse ncha ho thusa ho holisa sechaba sa Marang-rang!
contribute.ReasonToContribute: Sesebelisoa sena se hlokomeloa ke batšehetsi ba {{communityName}}. Thusa ho ts'ehetsa app ena hore re tle re etse phetoho maphelong a batho!

remove.title: Tlosa akhaonto
remove.content: O batla ho tlosa ak'haonte ee?
